name: Constantin Brancusi Exhibition at Neue Nationalgalerie
description: Fresh from the Centre Pompidou, this major exhibition presents over 150 works by Constantin Brancusi, one of the 20th century's most important sculptors, alongside a reconstruction of his famous Parisian studio. World-renowned pieces like 'The Kiss' and 'Slumbering Muse' anchor this rare survey of modernist sculpture. Part of the French Summer 2026 program bringing French cultural institutions to Berlin.
